description.zh-cn: 中华民国抗日战争时期与大日本帝国合作的政权，被普遍认为是日本在中国扶植的一个傀儡政权，首都设于南京。
description.en: A collaborationist government during the Second Sino-Japanese War that cooperated with the Empire of Japan. It is widely considered a puppet state of Japan, with its capital in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾是中国国民党的重要人物，后来成为汪精卫国民政府的首领。
description.en: A Chinese politician who was a prominent member of the Kuomintang and later became the head of the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的轴心国之一，在中国抗日战争期间扶植了汪精卫国民政府等多个傀儡政权。
description.en: One of the Axis powers during World War II, which established several puppet states in China during the Second Sino-Japanese War, including the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府的重要人物，在汪精卫死后继任其领导职务。
description.en: A key figure in the Wang Jingwei regime who succeeded Wang Jingwei as its leader after his death.

description.zh-cn: 标志着第二次世界大战结束的事件，直接导致了汪精卫国民政府的终结。
description.en: The event marking the end of World War II, which directly led to the collapse of the Wang Jingwei regime.

en: Reformed Government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 日本在中国扶植的早期傀儡政权之一，后并入汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: One of the early puppet states established by Japan in China, later merged into the Wang Jingwei regime.

nodes.id: 中华民国临时政府 (1937年－1940年)

zh-cn: 中华民国临时政府 (1937年－1940年)
en: Provisional Government of the Republic of China (1937–1940)

description.zh-cn: 日本在中国扶植的早期傀儡政权之一，后并入汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: One of the early puppet states established by Japan in China, later merged into the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的创建政党，在汪精卫叛逃后将其开除党籍。
description.en: The founding party of the Republic of China, which expelled Wang Jingwei after his defection.

description.zh-cn: 1927年至1948年中华民国的中央政府，抗战时期迁都重庆，与汪精卫国民政府对立。
description.en: The central government of the Republic of China from 1927 to 1948. It relocated its capital to Chongqing during the Second Sino-Japanese War and was opposed to the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 时任国民政府军事委员会委员长，领导中国进行抗日战争。
description.en: The Chairman of the Nationalist Government's Military Affairs Commission at the time, who led China in the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期的滇系军阀，汪精卫曾试图寻求其支持但未获成功。
description.en: A warlord of the Yunnan clique during the Republican era. Wang Jingwei unsuccessfully sought his support.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫的妻子，汪精卫国民政府内部“公馆派”的核心人物。
description.en: Wang Jingwei's wife and the central figure of the 'Mansion Clique' within the Wang Jingwei regime.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的欧洲轴心国，于1941年承认汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: A European Axis power in World War II that recognized the Wang Jingwei regime in 1941.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的欧洲轴心国，于1941年承认汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: A European Axis power in World War II that recognized the Wang Jingwei regime in 1941.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的同盟国之一，汪精卫国民政府于1943年对其宣战。
description.en: One of the Allied powers in World War II, against whom the Wang Jingwei regime declared war in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战的同盟国之一，汪精卫国民政府于1943年对其宣战。
description.en: One of the Allied powers in World War II, against whom the Wang Jingwei regime declared war in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，抗战胜利后下令炸毁了位于南京的汪精卫墓。
description.en: A general-in-chief of the Republic of China Army who, after the victory in the Second Sino-Japanese War, ordered the destruction of Wang Jingwei's tomb in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府要员，曾任外交部长。战后被国民政府以汉奸罪判处死刑。
description.en: A key official in the Wang Jingwei regime who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs. After the war, he was convicted of treason by the Nationalist Government and executed.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府要员。战后被国民政府判处死刑，后减为无期徒刑，病死于狱中。
description.en: A key official in the Wang Jingwei regime. After the war, he was sentenced to death by the Nationalist Government, which was later commuted to life imprisonment. He died in prison from illness.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府名义上管辖的政治实体，但在实际上保持了一定的独立性。
description.en: A political entity nominally under the jurisdiction of the Wang Jingwei regime, but which maintained a degree of independence in practice.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府名义上管辖的政治实体，但在实际上保持了一定的独立性。
description.en: A political entity nominally under the jurisdiction of the Wang Jingwei regime, but which maintained a degree of independence in practice.

description.zh-cn: 原国民革命军将领，于1943年1月率部投靠汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: A former general of the National Revolutionary Army who defected with his troops to the Wang Jingwei regime in January 1943.

description.zh-cn: 原国民革命军将领，于1943年4月被俘后投靠汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: A former general of the National Revolutionary Army who defected to the Wang Jingwei regime after being captured in April 1943.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国陆军大将、政治家，第四十任内阁总理大臣。1943年在东京会见汪精卫。
description.en: A general of the Imperial Japanese Army, politician, and the 40th Prime Minister of Japan. He met with Wang Jingwei in Tokyo in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 印度民族主义领袖，自由印度临时政府的领导人。1943年在东京会见汪精卫。
description.en: An Indian nationalist leader and the head of the Provisional Government of Free India. He met with Wang Jingwei in Tokyo in 1943.

description.zh-cn: 大日本帝国在中国抗日战争期间扶植了汪精卫国民政府作为其傀儡政权。
description.en: The Empire of Japan established the Wang Jingwei regime as its puppet state during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫响应日本近卫声明，与日本合作，在南京成立了国民政府。
description.en: Responding to Japan's Konoe Statement, Wang Jingwei collaborated with Japan to establish the Nationalist Government in Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府成立时，整合并接管了原中华民国维新政府的辖地与组织。
description.en: Upon its establishment, the Wang Jingwei regime integrated and took over the territory and organization of the former Reformed Government of the Republic of China.

relationships.source: 中华民国临时政府 (1937年－1940年)

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府成立时，整合并接管了原中华民国临时政府的辖地与组织。
description.en: Upon its establishment, the Wang Jingwei regime integrated and took over the territory and organization of the former Provisional Government of the Republic of China.

position.en: Acting Chairman, President of the Executive Yuan

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫是汪精卫国民政府的首任及核心领导人。
description.en: Wang Jingwei was the first and core leader of the Wang Jingwei regime.

position.zh-cn: 行政院院长、代理国民政府主席
position.en: President of the Executive Yuan, Acting Chairman of the Nationalist Government

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫去世后，陈公博接任政府首脑。
description.en: After Wang Jingwei's death, Chen Gongbo took over as the head of the government.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月15日日本宣布投降，次日汪精卫国民政府宣布解散，政权终结。
description.en: On August 15, 1945, Japan announced its surrender. The following day, the Wang Jingwei regime announced its dissolution, bringing the regime to an end.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府是抗战时期与迁都重庆的国民政府对立的政权，其合法性不被后者承认。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime was a government opposed to the Nationalist Government that had relocated to Chongqing during the war, and its legitimacy was not recognized by the latter.

description.zh-cn: 因汪精卫发表“艳电”公开宣布与日本合作，中国国民党中央执行委员会决议将其永远开除党籍。
description.en: Due to Wang Jingwei's 'Yan Telegram' publicly announcing his collaboration with Japan, the Central Executive Committee of the Kuomintang resolved to permanently expel him from the party.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫前往云南试图获取滇系军阀龙云的支持以合组政府，但龙云并未明确表态。
description.en: Wang Jingwei traveled to Yunnan to seek the support of warlord Long Yun for forming a new government, but Long Yun did not give a clear commitment.

description.zh-cn: 陈璧君是汪精卫的妻子。
description.en: Chen Bijun was Wang Jingwei's wife.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国承认汪精卫国民政府为代表中国的唯一合法政府并与其建交。
description.en: Nazi Germany recognized the Wang Jingwei regime as the sole legitimate government of China and established diplomatic relations with it.

description.zh-cn: 意大利承认汪精卫国民政府为代表中国的唯一合法政府并与其建交。
description.en: The Kingdom of Italy recognized the Wang Jingwei regime as the sole legitimate government of China and established diplomatic relations with it.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府于1943年1月9日对英国宣战。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime declared war on the British Empire on January 9, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府于1943年1月9日对美国宣战。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime declared war on the United States on January 9, 1943.

description.zh-cn: 日本投降后，陈公博被国民政府逮捕并于1946年以汉奸罪判处死刑、执行枪决。
description.en: After Japan's surrender, Chen Gongbo was arrested by the Nationalist Government, convicted of treason, sentenced to death, and executed in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 日本投降后，周佛海被国民政府逮捕，1946年被判处死刑，后被蒋介石减为无期徒刑，1948年因病死于狱中。
description.en: After Japan's surrender, Zhou Fohai was arrested by the Nationalist Government, sentenced to death in 1946, but his sentence was commuted to life imprisonment by Chiang Kai-shek. He died of illness in prison in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 日本投降后，褚民谊被国民政府逮捕并于1946年以汉奸罪判处死刑、执行枪决。
description.en: After Japan's surrender, Chu Minyi was arrested by the Nationalist Government, convicted of treason, sentenced to death, and executed in 1946.

description.zh-cn: 1946年，时任中国陆军总司令的何应钦下令炸毁了位于南京的汪精卫墓，并将其遗骸火化扬灰。
description.en: In 1946, He Yingqin, then Commander-in-Chief of the Chinese Army, ordered the destruction of Wang Jingwei's tomb in Nanjing, and had his remains cremated and scattered.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府名义上统辖华北政务委员会，但后者实际上保持了一定的独立性。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime nominally had jurisdiction over the North China Political Affairs Commission, but the latter maintained a degree of independence in practice.

description.zh-cn: 汪精卫国民政府名义上统辖蒙疆联合自治政府，但后者实际上保持了一定的独立性。
description.en: The Wang Jingwei regime nominally had jurisdiction over the Mengjiang United Autonomous Government, but the latter maintained a degree of independence in practice.

position.zh-cn: 山东方面军总司令/第三方面军总司令
position.en: Commander of the Shandong Front Army / Commander of the Third Front Army

description.zh-cn: 1943年1月18日，原国民党将领吴化文率所部约4万人投靠汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: On January 18, 1943, former KMT general Wu Huawen defected with his troops of about 40,000 men to the Wang Jingwei regime.

position.en: Commander of the Sixth Front Army

description.zh-cn: 1943年4月，原国民党将领孙殿英被俘后投靠汪精卫国民政府。
description.en: In April 1943, former KMT general Sun Dianying defected to the Wang Jingwei regime after being captured.

description.zh-cn: 1943年，汪精卫在东京会见时任日本内阁总理大臣东条英机。
description.en: In 1943, Wang Jingwei met with the then Prime Minister of Japan, Hideki Tojo, in Tokyo.

description.zh-cn: 1943年，汪精卫在东京会见自由印度临时政府领导人苏巴斯·钱德拉·鲍斯。
description.en: In 1943, Wang Jingwei met with Subhas Chandra Bose, the leader of the Provisional Government of Free India, in Tokyo.
